summary: AN ORDINANCE accepting an offer from The Trust for Public Land to convey certain property in Blocks 57, 59 and 60 of the First Addition to South Seattle by J.J. Moss and in Blocks 61 and 62 of J.J. Moss' Second Addition to South Seattle, to The City of Seattle for park, recreation, open space and greenbelt purposes and making an appropriation from the Park Acquisition and Development fund therefor.
